items.name: Full-stack application scaffold
items.description: Built complete application architecture with FastAPI backend, React TypeScript frontend, Docker Compose orchestration, PostgreSQL database with vector extensions, and Alembic migrations. Established development and production deployment profiles with Cloudflare tunnel support.

items.name: Core data models and API structure
items.description: Implemented database schema for clients, knowledge base, quotes, and coverage tracking. Created RESTful API endpoints with proper routing, dependencies, and error handling.

items.name: RAG-powered quote generation
items.description: Built intelligent quote generation engine that uses retrieval-augmented generation to create client quotes based on knowledge base, style guides, and sample quotes. Includes embedding-based semantic search and prompt engineering.

items.name: Knowledge management
items.description: Implemented knowledge base system for storing and retrieving client information, notes, and context. Includes vector embeddings for semantic search and relevance ranking.

items.name: Style and prompt customization
items.description: Created system for managing client-specific styles, sample quotes, and custom prompts. Allows fine-tuning of quote tone and content per client requirements.

items.name: Modern React frontend
items.description: Developed responsive single-page application with Vite, React, and TypeScript. Implemented multi-page navigation for quotes, email processing, coverage tracking, and settings.

items.name: Chat interface and history
items.description: Added interactive chat functionality with conversation history, allowing users to refine quotes through iterative dialogue. Includes prompt management API for reusable templates.

items.name: Upload queue and deduplication
items.description: Implemented file upload system with queue management, error handling, and automatic deduplication to prevent duplicate knowledge entries.

items.name: Email scraping and summarization
items.description: Built email processing pipeline that extracts content from articles, generates markdown summaries, and identifies key information. Includes polite scraping with rate limiting and fallback mechanisms.

items.name: Quote extraction and client linking
items.description: Implemented NLP-powered quote extraction from articles with automatic client name detection and linking. Surfaces relevant quotes with match confidence scoring.

items.name: Markdown rendering and display
items.description: Added markdown rendering for article summaries with proper formatting, bold highlighting for key metrics (DA/MUV), and clean presentation in the UI.

items.name: Automated coverage monitoring
items.description: Built comprehensive coverage tracking system that monitors Google Sheets for new quotes, automatically searches the web on configurable cadences, and stores matches with deduplication. Includes intelligent state machine for managing search frequency based on hit patterns.

items.name: Advanced matching algorithms
items.description: Implemented multi-stage matching pipeline combining exact substring matching, shingle-based Jaccard similarity, vector embeddings, and AI-powered adjudication to minimize false positives while maximizing coverage detection accuracy.

items.name: Coverage UI and notifications
items.description: Created coverage dashboard with unread tracking, filtering by client and date range, and one-click article access. Integrated email notifications for new coverage hits with idempotent delivery.

work: Docker Compose setup with dev/prod profiles
